summary: Tattoo retextures for popular body mods
descriptionHtml:
======CONTAINS NUDITY USE AT YOUR OWN DISCRETION=======

I retextured the TnT Athena and CBBE texture and added tattoos to the body to suit my personal preference, and after receiving permission from Thor925 and Caliente to share my retexture of there amazing bodyies i decided to do so. This is my first contribution to the community so any advice/ constructive criticism is appreciated.

=====
Note:
=====

i am playing with different ideas atm and i am willing to take custom request for TnT Athena as well as the other body re-placers (CBBE, TEC, ect) only after i receive  permission from the respective authors. So if you like my work and want something custom for yourself leave me a message and i will get back to you as soon as i can 

=============
Requirements:
=============
TnT Athena:
http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3844
 
CBBE :
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666

===========
Installation:
===========

extract files to desktop then place femalebody_1.dds in: 

Data/Textures/Actors/Character/Female

backup your femalebody_1.dds before you overwrite

overwrite & enjoy

Endorsement is never required but appreciated
also if you endorse me please also endorse \"TnT Athena\" as without there work i couldnt have done mine.

=======
Credits:
=======

TnT Members
============
2pac4eva7
motseer
DorkDiva
Thor925

These guys have done amazing work, and i thank Thor925 for allowing me to use there texture.


JollyR0ger
author: JollyR0ger
